name: On The Clock
description:
SUBMISSION FOR THE GMTK 2021 GAME JAM

The story of the game is that two companies are joining together, but the computer systems haven't. The player must connect batteries to outlets (joining them together) in order to reach computers to join the systems together.

NOTE:
A lot of things I wanted to include (Music, Sound Effects, more Polish, more Levels, etc) were just not possible as its now 7 am where I live and I've been working on this All Night and All Day. This is as good as it'll be for now.

Once I get some sleep, I'll try and handle some nice stuff (music and audio), as well as put out a trailer / video.
